title: Losing Lp randomly

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Last night I played blitzcrank and I was landing hooks left and right making my team fed we were about to win then I randomly dc I come back after 10 minutes and I won the game but lost my Lp. Is it possible if you can give me Lp back because im the reason we won that match. Would be great if you did

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Hey VortexGaming,

If you are counted as a leaver for that match it will be counted as a loss whether you win or weren't gone long. Riot has a strict policy of not touching your MMR/LP, so unfortunately they won't be able to help you. You can read more about Leaver Buster here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ

-DTN
